derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from intra- 'within' + Latin murus 'wall' + -al

entry.def: Intramural activities happen within one college or university, rather than between different colleges or universities.

example.ex: ...a comprehensive, well-supported program of intramural sports.
example.tran: 全面广泛、深受支持的校内运动项目

means.word_mean: 1. carried on within the bounds of an institution or community;
